author: Brent D. Griffiths
title: Herschel Walker says it's 'totally unfair' to ask him if he supports the bipartisan infrastructure bill that passed last year: 'I have to see all the facts'

sentence: After Herschel Walker moved to Georgia to launch a Republican U.S. Senate campaign, his team didn't seem especially eager about sending him out on the campaign trail.
author: Steve Benen
title: How many times can Herschel Walker fumble before he's benched?
